name: A 2020 Christmas
description:
Happy Holidays!

Every year I try to be as crafty as possible with the gifts for the people in my life and in the interest of social distancing, I took the year to make this happen.

I designed this brief digital experience recapping a few of the years events in a 'Twas the Night Before Christmas' style.

I see no reason not to distribute the gift to everyone :)

Thanks for your time and be safe!
